definition: to cup one's hands in salute/to surround/to arch/to dig earth with the snout/arched

sentences.english: The arch of short hairs covering this ridge.
sentences.chinese: 覆蓋於眉上的拱狀短毛。

sentences.english: The first painted segment of the arch is ready for the mounting.
sentences.chinese: 拱狀大梁的第一部分已經進入安置準備。

sentences.english: The bridge will be fixed on two arched girders.
sentences.chinese: 大橋將由兩個拱狀大梁組成。

sentences.english: Arching across the sky is the central band of our Milky Way Galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 拱狀劃過天空的則是銀河系的中央地帶。
